scripts.build-bd: sass index.scss:QuickSCSS.theme.css --style=compressed --no-source-map -q && postcss QuickSCSS.theme.css -u postcss-csso -r --no-map && build-bd
scripts.build-web: sass index.scss:QuickSCSS.user.css --style=compressed --no-source-map -q && postcss QuickSCSS.user.css -u postcss-unprefix autoprefixer postcss-csso -r --no-map && build-web
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-bd && npm run build-web
